entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Only call AddDataProtection in Authentication Services that require it #47410
  • IBindFromHttpContext in analyzer message should be IBindableFromHttpContext #47409
  • Add support for X-Azure-FDID as a UseForwardedHeaders "Known Proxy" #47408
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #47407
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #47406
  • Allow configuration of request/response buffer limits for TestServer #47401
  • JwtBearerHandler.cs hardcoded "Bearer " #47399
  • Swagger: Missing Accept-Header #47398
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #47393
  • Bundled Component Nested JS files #47391
  • BindAsync support in RDG doesn't handle implementations inherited from interfaces. #47389
    8.0-preview4

Closed

  • Update gRPC JSON transcoding property priority #47349
    .NET 8 Planning
  • „Method not found: 'Boolean System.Collections.BitArray.HasAllSet()'.” #47208
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #47394
  • Dictionary<string, object> in Form has null value #47383
  • Model binding always fails with decimal and double types when culture number format is different from InvariantCulture #46837
  • ActionMethod URL generation creates invalid URLs when POST action has a different route template #47375
  • question about blazor United? #47390
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #47382

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor HtmlRenderer layering #47404
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47400
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3
  • Support populating cache without serving from it. #47392
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, feature-output-caching

Merged

  • Update gRPC JSON transcoding to prioritize JSON name #47385
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview4
  • Update Webpack in SignalR #47403
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview4
  • Run quarantined tests on release/8.0 branches #47402
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47277
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9395d4e` to `e4156bd` #47397
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e49c6b9` to `a0ced33` #47396
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
  • Resolve parent cultures via parent property instead of string process… #47365
    area-mvc, area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview4
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • DbContextHealthCheck handles exceptions thrown by CustomTestQuery #47121
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor
  • Move Returns400IfNoMatchingRouteValueForRequiredParam test case to shared RDG/RDF test infra. #47360
    area-runtime
